page.title: 04FARMWAYS_CONTINUED.
page.content:
{FEEDMILL. The feedmill has a potential production capacity of forty thousand tons.It produces a compound feed containing wheat and barley from the grain store, and other imported products from America and E.E.C. countries. The feed mixing system is computerised,to obtain the best mix for each type of animal feed.When a certain type of feed is required, a specific computer programme is used.This controls the amount of each ingredient entering the feed.
{SEED PLANT. This is where the seeds of wheat, barley, grass, and turnips are covered with a dressing, to protect them from disease and insects.
